activities: Versaic is a company that processes personal data only on the behalf of Versaic clients for the purpose of managing applications on the behalf of their client.  Versaic only accesses client data at the request of the client.  Versaic may access sytems containing client data to backup the production system, maintain the production system, and backup client data.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Data submitted to our clients. No data is manually processed.
